original_title: 鯛を持って駆ける少女
overview: Misuzu, a second-year junior high school student who confessed to the most handsome boy in school and decided to go on a date. Misuzu, who runs a fishmonger in her family's home, helps her with the housework, and she believes that the smell of fish permeates her body. Misuzu tries to get rid of the smell of fish before her date, but an unexpected rival appears...
title: 鯛を持って駆ける少女
